mapper.update:
update t_station_finance_data
station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER},
month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER},
self_peak_power = #{selfPeakPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_peak_elcprice = #{selfPeakElcprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_peak_discount = #{selfPeakDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_power = #{selfPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_elcprice = #{selfElcprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_discount = #{selfDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_low_power = #{selfLowPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_low_elcprice = #{selfLowElcprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
self_low_discount = #{selfLowDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sell_power = #{sellPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_power = #{totalPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
p_power_price = #{pPowerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
subsidy_price = #{subsidyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
month_subsidy_profit = #{monthSubsidyProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
month_subsidy_price = #{monthSubsidyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plan_power = #{planPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
plan_profit = #{planProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
totol_profit = #{totolProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_self_profit = #{totalSelfProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_station_finance_data set station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, self_peak_power = #{selfPeakPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_peak_elcprice = #{selfPeakElcprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_peak_discount = #{selfPeakDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_power = #{selfPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_elcprice = #{selfElcprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_discount = #{selfDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_low_power = #{selfLowPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_low_elcprice = #{selfLowElcprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, self_low_discount = #{selfLowDiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sell_power = #{sellPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_power = #{totalPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, p_power_price = #{pPowerPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, subsidy_price = #{subsidyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, month_subsidy_profit = #{monthSubsidyProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, month_subsidy_price = #{monthSubsidyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, plan_power = #{planPower,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, plan_profit = #{planProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totol_profit = #{totolProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_self_profit = #{totalSelfProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT total_power power, totol_profit benefit, month date FROM t_station_finance_data t WHERE station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT sum(total_power) power, sum(totol_profit) benefit, year date FROM t_station_finance_data t WHERE station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by year
SELECT plan_power power, plan_profit benefit, month date FROM t_station_finance_data t WHERE station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT sum(plan_power) power, sum(plan_profit) benefit, year date FROM t_station_finance_data t WHERE station_id = #{stationId,jdbcType=BIGINT} group by year
